verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wonderful The Matchless Grace Of Jesus, Deeper Than The Mighty Rolling Sea, Higher Than The Mountain, Sparkling Like A Fountain, All Sufficient Grace For Even Me; Broader Than The Scope Of My Transgressions, Greater Far Than All My Sin And Shame; O Magnify The Precious Name Of Jesus, Praise His Name!{/lang-eng}
